name: Bruschetta
ingredients: 2 to 4 cloves garlic, minced (depending on preference)
1 Loaf Italian bread (or any bread you prefer for texture)
instructions: Slice the bread about 1/2 inch thick and drizzle with 2 Tablespoons of the olive oil.
Toast the bread in the oven until golden brown.
In a large bowl, combine the diced tomatoes, basil, and garlic.
Add the balsamic vinegar, the remaining olive oil, salt, and pepper, and mix thoroughly.
Spoon the tomato mixture evenly onto each slice of toasted bread.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan and serve immediately.
